password-reset-email-prompt-message: Enter your account's email address, and we'll send you an email with a link to reset your password.
password-reset-email-submit-success-mess: An email has been sent. If you have't received it in a few minutes, please check your spam folder.
password-reset-email-submit-failure-mess: The provided email doesn't seem to be linked with any account.
registration-email-submit-success-messag: We've sent you an email with your registration form link.
registration-email-submit-failure-messag: The provided email address is already linked with an account.
register-link-request-prompt-message: Please provide your email address to receive your registration form link.
